title: England debutant Tyrone Mings stood tall with both performance and attitude on an emotionally-testing night
text:
Tyrone Mings will be remembered as one of the men who reported the racists on his big night in Sofia, but his on-pitch performance on his England debut should not be forgotten.

This was a night when nobody would have blamed the England players if minds had wandered, concentration had been lost and, ultimately, performances became irrelevant.

But Gareth Southgate’s much-changed team, including debutant Mings, did not put a foot wrong and the central defender can be extremely proud of how he conducted himself in an England shirt for the first time.

Mings had paid to fly eight of his family and friends out to Sofia to watch his first appearance for his country. They had not been planning to attend the game, assuming Michael Keane or Joe Gomez would get the nod ahead of him.

At half-time, they had not heard the monkey chanting aimed at Mings but had proudly witnessed him make a confident start to his England career.
description: Tyrone Mings will be remembered as one of the men who reported the racists on his big night in Sofia, but his on-pitch performance on his England debut should not be forgotten.
